title: Who is ready for Opl
body:
Another legatree v chiefs game it's going to be sick just going to ask who is coming to this amazing thing 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

replies.body: Does anyone know what kind of skin we will receive or at least know if it's a legacy skin?
its normally one of the new skins cos last time it was arcade riven which only just came out at the time
Can't wait to run into some rioters {{champion:115}}
